#### Velez

<b>Cedo</b> -<b>is</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; apartar-se, ou ir-se &ensp; <small>cum ablat.</small> </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>1</b><br>cedere ab, uel de oppido, uel ex ciuitate <br> patria, loco, urbe cedere <br> <br><b>X</b><br>cedere alicui &ensp; <small><small>i, victum se fateri, vel non repugnare</small></small> <br> cedere bonis &ensp; <small>ceder dos bens</small> <br> cedere host uictoriam &ensp; <small>dar vitoria</small> <br> hoc cessit in prouerbium &ensp; <small><small>i, proverbio dici coepit</small></small> <br> litem aduersario cedere; uel lite cedere &ensp; <small>ceder na demanda</small> <br> romani Viriato, duci Lusitano cesserunt <br> tempori, uel oneri cedere &ensp; <small>accommodar-se ao tempo, render-se á carga</small> <br> uita, uel e uita, uel fato cedere &ensp; <small>morrer</small> </p>
